about_the_game:
If road works are your favorite mission types, the Dynapac Pack is the perfect addition to your Construction Simulator game, as this DLC contains six machines which are ideal for these jobs.

The Dynapac Pack includes:
• Dynapac CC4200 Vl (Asphalt Compactor)
• Dynapac CC1400 Vl (Asphalt Compactor)
• Dynapac CA3500D SEISMIC (Soil Compactor)
• Dynapac F1250CS PLUS (Asphalt Paver)
• Dynapac SD2500WS (Asphalt Paver)
• Dynapac F80W (Asphalt Paver)
detailed_description:
If road works are your favorite mission types, the Dynapac Pack is the perfect addition to your Construction Simulator game, as this DLC contains six machines which are ideal for these jobs.

The Dynapac Pack includes:
• Dynapac CC4200 Vl (Asphalt Compactor)
• Dynapac CC1400 Vl (Asphalt Compactor)
• Dynapac CA3500D SEISMIC (Soil Compactor)
• Dynapac F1250CS PLUS (Asphalt Paver)
• Dynapac SD2500WS (Asphalt Paver)
• Dynapac F80W (Asphalt Paver)
